# VulkanSDK
add3rdbinarypackage(
  NAME
  VulkanSDK
  PLATFORM
  Windows
  VERSION
  1.3.243.0
  HASH
  23ded0e6155a8ea265da84bd62f7a45cc3fc637fb1eeba61a5b9430fa704e4b5
  INCLUDE
  $<SOURCE_DIR>/Include
  LINK
  $<SOURCE_DIR>/Lib
  LIB
  vulkan-1)
add3rdbinarypackage(
  NAME
  VulkanSDK
  PLATFORM
  Darwin
  VERSION
  1.3.243.0
  HASH
  a5c63a4f29984540efa00190240d31b59539413cf4783792bd9f53207f4f7d07
  INCLUDE
  $<SOURCE_DIR>/macOS/include
  LINK
  $<SOURCE_DIR>/macOS/lib
  LIB
  vulkan.1)
